mapper.select: SELECT ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT D.ID, D.DATA_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, D.DATA_PRICE, D.DATA_SCHOOL, D.DATA_MAJOR, D.DATA_REGISTER_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER M INNER JOIN TBL_DATA D ON M.MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID
SELECT P.ID, P.PROJECT_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, P.PROJECT_SCHOOL, P.PROJECT_MAJOR, P.PROJECT_END_DATE, P.PROJECT_REGISTER_DATE FROM TBL_MEMBER M INNER JOIN TBL_PROJECT P ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID
